overview: Talib felt that his life was empty and he began to study the Book of Riyadus Solihin together with Halim who was made a friend and teacher to discuss the contents of the book. At the same time, he became attracted to Diana, the granddaughter of Imam Halim. Talib dared to ask his mother to seek on Diana, but the answer to his proposal was delayed by Imam Halim. How did it end?
title: Cinta Riyadus Solihin
